BackstoryDef.title: wardworld sheperd
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a sanitized wardworld. [PAWN_pronoun] tended the gentle herds and looked after the frail residents roaming cold beaches and sun-bleached valleys.

BackstoryDef.title: junior nurse
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had to fill the position of [PAWN_possessive] deceased parent as a nurse in one of the wardworld sanitoriums. [PAWN_pronoun] soon developed into a professional, but constant pressure and responsibility left [PAWN_nameDef] a bit psychologically unstable.

BackstoryDef.title: fragile settler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many shipped off to a wardworld due to [PAWN_possessive] compromised immune system. Upon arrival, [PAWN_possessive] spot in an insurance-covered colony was already occupied by someone else. [PAWN_nameDef] joined a small community of similarly dispossessed to survive out among the bleak, rolling hills.

BackstoryDef.title: immunologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] slaved away [PAWN_possessive] university years and landed a job as a medical researcher on a distant wardworld. [PAWN_pronoun] worked at the forefront of innovation, but the not-so-public techniques used in this research left [PAWN_objective] unable to look a patient in the eye ever again.

BackstoryDef.title: wide-eyed scavenger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised a nomad among the shelled-out cities of a ruinworld. [PAWN_pronoun] hunted for scrap among the levelled dwellings and mass graves, turning it in for meagre sustenance and tales of loyalty and sacrifice that around the dinner table.

BackstoryDef.title: justiciar trainee
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] studied to be a justiciar at one of the religious schools of a ruinworld. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to mediate conflicts and defuse social tension, but learned a little too much of history and lost what little taste for fighting [PAWN_pronoun] had in the first place.

BackstoryDef.title: junkworld navigator
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] led caravans through precarious ruins of a war-torn world. Somewhere between the crater fields and collapsed hydroponic farms [PAWN_pronoun] gained the grit and the odour of a true survivor.

BackstoryDef.title: reclamation officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as an overseer of a small-scale wasteland resettlement operation. Maintaining both the fragile ecosystem and dwindling morale was practically impossible, but [PAWN_nameDef] persevered until the bitter end. Dishonorably discharged, [PAWN_possessive] boarded a salvage freighter and left the planet, hoping never to return.
